Bay Watch.name: Nein
Bay Watch.description: 7m R of chimney. Up easy line.

Bay Watch.name: Plunging Neckline
Bay Watch.description: 3m R of Nein. Take the broken corner. A steep start, but then eases off.

Bay Watch.name: The Crux
Bay Watch.description: A bit steep to start. Good holds. Easy scramble to top

Bay Watch.name: Pineapple Express
Bay Watch.description: Start in brown corner and move up to small ledge. From here step L onto face and climb straight up.

Bay Watch.name: Reggaetonera
Bay Watch.description: Start underneath the large flake on the far right of the crag. Move up and left to gain the vertical crack, which leads to small ledge. From here climb straight up to the top.

The Platform.name: Welcome to the Platform
The Platform.description: Start as for Casino Corner, but move L onto the face at 3m. Up past horizontal break to belay on ledge.

The Platform.name: Casino Corner
The Platform.description: 5m R of Platform Crack. Up broken corner to horizontal break. Move R and up to ledge.

The Platform.name: Roulette
The Platform.description: Start 2m R of Casino Corner. Up shallow groove to horizontal break. Step L and up past 2 bolts to ledge.

The Platform.name: Blackjack
The Platform.description: Start 4m R of Roulette at thin crack. Up to horizontal break, then straight up past 2 bolts to ledge.

The Platform.name: Slot Machine
The Platform.description: Start 2m R of Blackjack. Climb the thin crack to horizontal break. Move slightly L and up past 2 bolts to ledge.

Lands End.name: Fisherman's Friend
Lands End.description: The obvious corner on the L side of the crag.

Lands End.name: All at Sea
Lands End.description: 2m R of Fisherman's Friend. Up the face past 2 bolts.

Lands End.name: Poseidon's Trident
Lands End.description: 2m R of All at Sea. Up the face past 3 bolts.

Lands End.name: Neptune's Net
Lands End.description: Start as for Poseidon's Trident, but after the 2nd bolt move R and up the steep face.

Lands End.name: Davy Jones' Locker
Lands End.description: The steep face 2m R of Neptune's Net. Difficult moves past 3 bolts.

Ticket to Ride.name: Magical Mystery Tour
Ticket to Ride.description: Start at the leftmost end of the crag. Climb the obvious crack system.

Ticket to Ride.name: Yellow Submarine
Ticket to Ride.description: 3m R of Magical Mystery Tour. Up the face past 2 bolts to a small overhang. Pull through and continue to the top.

Ticket to Ride.name: Strawberry Fields Forever
Ticket to Ride.description: Start 2m R of Yellow Submarine. Climb the steep face past 3 bolts, with a crux move at the second bolt.

Ticket to Ride.name: Here Comes the Sun
Ticket to Ride.description: The obvious overhanging arete on the right side of the crag. Powerful moves past 4 bolts.

Ticket to Ride.name: A Day in the Life
Ticket to Ride.description: Start just right of Here Comes the Sun. Climb the blank-looking face with technical moves past 4 bolts.
